If Owner Type = Trust AND SourceOfFunds_Check_Amount > 0 AND SourceOfFunds_1035_Amount = 0 AND Annuitant_Age > [Age Max - New Money/Contribution ONLY] then ISSUE ERROR MESSAGE: The Annuitant Age must be less than [Age Max - New Money/Contribution ONLY] for New Money Contribution;8. If Owner Type = Trust AND SourceOfFunds_Check_Amount > 0 AND SourceOfFunds_1035_Amount >0 AND Annuitant_Age > [Age Max - 1035 Insurance Exchange included] then ISSUE ERROR MESSAGE: The Annuitant Age must be less than [Age Max - 1035 Insurance Exchange included] for New Money Contribution;11. If (1035_ExchangeType = Conversion from NRR to FPRA, Additional Payment into Existing Contract) AND (SourceOfFunds_Check_Amount >0) then ISSUE ERROR MESSAGE: Multiple funding sources are not available for Add Pay or Conversions;12. If Plan_Type = Inherited Non-Qualified AND SourceOfFunds_Check_Amount >0 then issue Error message: Only 1 one 1035 Exchange is allowed as source of funds for Inherited Plan Type
